body:
"Could not connect to default or fallback server, please try again later: io.netty.channel.ConnectTimeoutException"

anybody else getting this right now?

title: Server error

replies.body:
The server is currently down. 

The hubs are experiencing some issue apparently. You can always directly connect to a particular game.
